docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: This is the home page for Data Hub connector documentation. Select Connectors in the side menu to browse individual connectors, or use the AI-powered Search page to generate documentation on the fly.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This site hosts autogenerated documentation for Data Hub connectors.

docs.title: Prerequisites

  2. Enable API access under Settings ▸ Integrations.

docs.title: Configuring DemoCRM API Connector
docs.text: This connector allows you to interact with the DemoCRM API, enabling integration with various applications. To make use of this connector, you'll need to have an API key from your DemoCRM account.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
1. Create an API key in DemoCRM.
  2. Install the required libraries for the connector

docs.title: Connector Setup
docs.text:
Below table lists the fields shown in the connector configuration form.

Field Description API Key Token for requests obtained from your DemoCRM account

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: Technical Name Type Default Example Description api_key String abc123 Your DemoCRM API key

docs.title: Tables
docs.text:
Table Column Data Type customers - - id String email String

Generated automatically — 2025-07-29T01:38:03.425715Z

docs.title: Configuring Test Connector
docs.text: This connector is used as a test stub to verify automatic documentation generation.
